replies.msg: 掂咗
轉玩 Caleera，可以裝4招技仲可以儲滿氣連爆技

隻game 動作嗰 part 唔錯，摸熟左可以空中連技又多變化，當然前提係用手制玩
農嗰方面預左，始終係手機 game，無轉蛋算係非洲福音，雖然可以買2萬箱
如果開放連線打 raid 會再好d，期待佢慢慢加內容，最好可以同朋友一齊推塔打寶，單機農好快悶

更新
https://m.nexon.com/forum/thread/39895?fbclid=IwAR2ykup2jVot9sEElc15XoitRZSbeLAY8ltfsJnLDIBdXpWO5qhccCL_d74

Patch Notes – March 14th
STAFF 17:54 95
◈ Update Details:
- Once the maintenance is completed, please update the application in the corresponding markets.
- After the application update, additional data will be downloaded, therefore we recommend that you turn on the “Wi-Fi.”
- The game is not available during the maintenance.
- If you see an [Open] button instead of [Update] button
in the Google Play Store, in your device, go to Settings > General > App > Play Store > Delete saved data, and try again.
- In case you’re using a guest account, remember that you must link your account before the update.



◈ Patch Contents:
▶ Balancing
- One character and some equipment options, stages, etc. will be balanced.



1. Character Balancing
1). Leta attack balancing

- Ground ATK increased approx. 30%.

- The third aerial hit is changed to piercing attack.



2. Equipment Options Balancing
1) Equipment enhancement option stats balancing

Equipment Type

Enhancement Option

Changes

Legendary Necklace

Increase ATK in proportion to ACC

8% à 2%

Unique/Legendary Earrings

Increase ATK in proportion to DEF

5.5% / 7% à 1%



2) Accessory potential option stats balancing

Item Type

Before

After

Necklace

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Normal ATK Additional DMG %

(13.5% / 16.5% / 20% / 23.5% / 24.675%)

All balanced to 7%

Necklace

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Skill ATK Additional DMG %

(13.5% / 16.5% / 20% / 23.5% / 24.675%)

All balanced to 7%

Earrings

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Increase ATK in proportion to ACC %

(5.5% / 7% / 8.5% / 11% / 11.55%)

All balanced to 7%

Earrings

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Increase ATK in proportion to EVD %

(5.5% / 7% / 8.5% / 11% / 11.55%)

All balanced to 3%

Ring

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Increase ATK in proportion to DEF %

(2.5% / 5% / 7.5% / 10% / 10.5%)

All balanced to 1.25%

Ring

Magic / Rare / Epic / Unique 1,2

Increase ATK in proportion to HP %

(2.5% / 5% / 7.5% / 10% / 10.5%)

All balanced to 1%



3) Equipment random option stats balancing

Equipment Type

Before

After

Necklace / Earrings

Normal ATK Additional DMG % (1 ~ 3% / 2 ~ 6%)

All balanced from min. 1% to max. 3%

Necklace / Earrings

Skill ATK Additional DMG %

(1 ~ 3% / 2 ~ 6%)

All balanced from min. 1% to max. 3%



3. Quest Level Balance and Change in Recommended Stages
1) Change of min. level for ‘An Unexpected Call’

Before

After

Lv. 15

Lv. 1



2) Removal of some recommended stages from quests

- Removal of ‘Kanka Te Tarak Warrior's Plaza’ in the recommended stage for ‘The State of the Zencaka Tribe’ quest.



4. Balances of stages difficulty
- Some stages’ difficulties will be balanced.

1) Prologue balance

Enemy

HP Change

Charma soldier

HP 1 à 340

Charma boss

Basic HP à 50% increase



2) Stage monsters balance

Stage monster type

Stat

Change

All monsters in Act 1

Defense / HP

50% decrease from original

All monsters in Act 2, 3

Defense / HP

23%~30% decrease from original



3) All stages monsters balance

Stage monster type

Stat

Change

Stage boss

Attack/ Defense / HP

10% decrease from original

▶ Comfortability Improvements
5. Guild comfortability improvement
- Accessibility to guild contents will be improved.

1) Guild contents

Content

Changes

Guild opening level

Lv. 20 à Lv. 15

Guild creation cost

1,000,000 à 200,000 Gold

Guild settings change cost

500,000 à 50,000

- For those users who created a Guild or changed the setting before the maintenance, the amount of coins corresponding to the change will be returned.

- Check your Mailbox after the maintenance for the reward.

* The reward delivery might be delayed due to different circumstances. In case of delayed we will notify you through the Patch Notes.



6. In-game UI and Addition Functions Improvement
1) Addition of Bag shortcut on the right corner of the Lobby




2) Addition of a community shortcut

- An official Facebook page shortcut button will be added.




3) Request contents will be blocked until they are available.

- The button for Request will be blocked until the corresponding contents are opened.




4) Improvement of in-game auto shut-off function

- In Settings – [Device] the [Prevent auto shut-off] function timer option will be removed.




6) Fix of in-game texts

- Some different words used for the same meaning will be fixed for consistency.

Before

After

Guild

Agency

Clan

Guild



7) Addition of a notification function for rewards

- In the upper right corner in Town menu, the following notification will be added.

> Angel's Blessing rewards available.

> Today's Missions rewards available.



▶ Bug fixes


- Fixed the issue where Leta’s passive skills (explosive orb creation when using an active skill / orb explosion when passive skill button is touched) damage was applied as 0 under certain conditions.

- Fixed a bug that caused the damage of Evil Flower boss in ‘Forest Outskirts Entrance’ to be shown as 0.

- Fixed a bug that caused the damage of Subject Aegis boss in ‘Oubliette Deepest Floor Vengeful Spirit Gathering Place 'to be shown as 0.

- Changed the ‘Dwarven Trick Dust' item icon.




- Changed the displayed name of 'Dwarven Trick Dust' in the store.

- Fixed an error where the date information on the attendance board was missing.

- Fixed a bug where the character portraits did not appear in-game in iOS.

- Fixed some awkward instructions and scenes.
